name: Peter's Haystack Maze
description:
Peter's Haystack Maze is a small Andy's Apple Farm fan-made project that was created in one week. All characters belong to M36Games. Any similarities between the events of this game and the events of Andy's Apple Farm Chapter 1 are purely coincidental. This game is not canon to the official Andy's Apple Farm story.

Play tag with Peter the Pumpkin! Find out why you have to play tag with Peter the Pumpkin! Please don't make me play tag with Peter the Pumpkin!

This game can be played with one hand! Press the [SPACEBAR] to navigate through the menus! Press the [A KEY] to look left and the [D KEY] to look right! Press the [W KEY] to move forward and the [S KEY] to move back! Enjoy the game!

There are two endings and a handful of secrets. Can you find them all?

WARNING: This game contains jumpscares, flashing lights, and loud noises.
